con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="Orders" targetNamespace="http://www.pluralsight.com/service/Orders/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://www.pluralsight.com/service/Orders/" xmlns:order="http://www.pluralsight.com/service/Order" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.pluralsight.com/service/Order" schemaLocation="Order.xsd"></xsd:import> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="ProcessOrderPlacementRequest"> <wsdl:part element="order:orderInquiry" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ProcessOrderPlacementResponse"> <wsdl:part element="order:orderInquiryResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ProcessOrderPlacementFault"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="order:orderInquiryFault"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="Orders"> <wsdl:operation name="ProcessOrderPlacement"> <wsdl:input message="tns:ProcessOrderPlacementRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:ProcessOrderPlacementResponse"/> <wsdl:fault name="fault" message="tns:ProcessOrderPlacementFault"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="OrdersSOAP" type="tns:Orders"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="ProcessOrderPlacement"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.pluralsight.com/service/Orders/ProcessOrderPlacement"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="Orders"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:OrdersSOAP" name="OrdersSOAP"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/apache-cxf-jax-ws-demo/Orders"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.pluralsight.com/service/Order" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.pluralsight.com/service/Order"> <xsd:element name="orderInquiry" type="tns:OrderInquiryType"/> <xsd:element name="orderInquiryResponse" type="tns:OrderInquiryResponseType"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="orderInquiryFault" type="tns:FaultType"></xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="FaultType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OrderInquiryType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="uniqueOrderId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="orderQuantity" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="accountId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="ean13" type="xsd:long"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AccountType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="accountId" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BookType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ean13" type="xsd:long"/> <xsd:element name="title" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="OrderStatusType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="READY"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FULLFILLED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="BACKORDER"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="OrderType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="orderItems" type="tns:OrderItemType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xsd:element name="orderStatus" type="tns:OrderStatusType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OrderItemType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="lineNumber" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="expectedShippingDate" type="xsd:date"/> <xsd:element name="book" type="tns:BookType"/> <xsd:element name="price" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xsd:element name="quantityShipped" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OrderInquiryResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="order" type="tns:OrderType"/> <xsd:element name="account" type="tns:AccountType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

con:mockService.name: ORDERS-MockService

con:mockOperation.name: ProcessOrderPlacement

con:response.name: RESP-NO-OrderID
con:response.con:responseContent: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>cvc-complex-type.2.4.a: Invalid content was found starting with element '{"http://www.pluralsight.com/service/Order":orderQuantity}'. One of '{"http://www.pluralsight.com/service/Order":uniqueOrderId}' is expected.</faultstring> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:response.name: RESP-NO-AccountID
con:response.con:responseContent: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>cvc-complex-type.2.4.a: Invalid content was found starting with element '{"http://www.pluralsight.com/service/Order":ean13}'. One of '{"http://www.pluralsight.com/service/Order":accountId}' is expected.</faultstring> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
